In this game, The Bot is freaking good than Original Player.
Best Game before CS:GO comes out.

I dont shoot a lot, mainly just surf.
10/10
How are you on steam if you don't own this?

I never got to spend much time on this game, but it really was a huge step into making its follow-up games better. I really reccommend playing CS:GO. It's a great game with better map detailing and gun control.
Just buy it if you haven't played it. A classic, best FPS title. Still better than COD
Game top, nothing more to say. I have been playing it for over 8 years and have not been disappointed . Recommend personally
Better than cs:GO There is No case and rank system 10/10 This game Awensome!!!
Meilleur jeu de tout les temps ! :D

Just played this game for 6 hours, after playing with fucking Russians in matchmaking in CSGO, this game is made me a new beautiful happy baby. 10/10 would play again. tell your nan and your grandma and ur mom and ur dad and ur whole fucking family to buy this game.

Si CS:CZ es el hijo bastardo, CS:S es como el hijo del medio, es importante, pero no como el primero o el ultimo.
Quieres un CS:GO, sin complicaciones, que te corra a 60fps con un pentium 2, sin microtransacciones ni skins, pero que no se vea tan viejo como el veterano de 4 generaciones llamado CS 1.6.

Entonces este es tu juego, siendo tan perfecto no me sorprende que Valve lo deje mas caro que CS:GO.
8/10
This game is awesome well made and very action packed love this game thank you valve

bought for gmod textures, spent months of my life sliding on triangular prisms
10/10

Better than the original because it doesn't look like crap and littered with mod servers, and better than Global Offensive because it doesn't have all that gun cosmetic bullcrap. Anyways, the game is very fun. Twitch gameplay at its best, and It's incredibly satisfying to get kills. I would reccomend you play the game with headphones on, as hearing opponent's footsteps is vital to making it out of suprise encounters. Also, be weary of open areas, becaule people like to AWP spam. Best if you can get it during a sale.
if you want a game with hacking bot this is the game for you xD. good game but the bots are like hack pre fire around walls and all ways aim your head gg will play with hacking bot.

This is one of those games that'll keep on bringing in the fun, action and thrill in the first-person shooter genre. One of the best games out there. :) 

UPDATE (11/17/2020):
115 hours in and I'm just totally addicted right now, I truly admire how awesome and beautiful this game is even after 15 years since release. A masterpiece of a fast-paced shooter right here.
